abstract: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said the city would start taking a harder line on demonstrators camping out in Zuccotti Park and would insist on marching permits.
snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said the city would start taking a harder line on demonstrators camping out in Zuccotti Park and would insist on marching permits.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said the city was going to start taking a harder line on demonstrators camping out in Zuccotti Park and insist on marching permits. [Daily Politics]
